name: The Truth
description: The Truth by True Canna Genetics is a rare indica-dominant strain that crosses Triangle Kush with a SFV OG and a backcrossed Chemdawg hybrid. Its heavy painkilling properties are accented by an earthy, spicy aroma characteristic of Kush varieties. The Truth is a colorful high-yielding strain that flowers in 63 days indoors or in early October for outdoor gardens.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Uplifted, Tingly, Happy, Euphoric, Stress, Pain, Headaches, Depression, Muscle Spasms, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Headache, Paranoid
